message.body: Hey! Hope you are doing ok. I'm considering doing some personal training at ######. Would you be interested?
Probably not. I doubt I could afford it and even if so I don't have time to do it enough
Let me know how it goes for you though. And I definitely want to get together soon, things are just bad right now (### is having pretty major health issues).
No worries. I'm prob going to wait a few weeks b4 I decide. If I feel comfortable (and motivated) to make my own routines I may pass on it as well.
Let me know when you are free to get together. I can always bring over food or wine, or even ice cream :) Sounds like you are under a lot of stress so please let me know if u need anything.
